name: HiveMind Strategies
description:
HiveMind Strategies LLC is a full service public relations, communications and marketing consultancy based in Washington, D.C. and comprised of experienced media specialists. HiveMind Strategies offers a variety of services including media relations, strategic communications, marketing analysis, branding, writing support, graphic design, literary publicity, project and event management, audio and video media services, media buying and community relations.
Collectively, HiveMind consultants have a wide range of experience in the public relations/communications strategy arena, including political and advocacy relations and have worked with top media outlets including The New York Times Co., The Washington Post Co., Landmark Communications, AOL, among others. We leverage our collective skills and our extensive network to deliver results. Providing clients Big Power On Main Street, HiveMind is a one-stop shop for all things media related offering world-class services to individuals, organizations, and companies.
